None.Name: Tainted Chaos
None.Description: Activate to create a disturbing aura of 20m radius around the caster that will lure all units within on to chaos: units around the caster will be confused and thus unable to distinguish between friend and foe. They will therefore start attacking whatever entity is next to them no matter if it is friendly or hostile. Affects friend and foe alike. Lasts for 10 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.
